data.title: Sales Program Manager Job - NBCUniversal - Incline Village, NV (EXPIRED)
data.meta_description: Sales Program Manager Job at NBCUniversal in Incline Village, NV
data.text:
Job Description

Responsibilities

The Program Manager will be responsible for overseeing and facilitating program implementation between internal departments and pre-selected vendors. Responsibilities for this position include:

• Work with the sales team to manage the execution of client programs and to meet pre-set deadlines

• Program setup and implementation with internal applications and external vendors.

• Review of client programs to ensure legal and regulatory compliance in accordance with company guidelines and policies.

• Review of projects for accuracy and completeness.

• Assist in developing internal processes. Preparation of program specs and training to distribute to the appropriate internal functional groups (wed development, production, vendor management, accounting, and sales)

• Data collection to assist with preparation of company and departmental reports

• Use Salesforce (CRM) and other company internal software to monitor company records and its outcomes and to perform daily functions.

• Program performance oversight including quality assurance, error resolution, limit enforcement, fraud, and customer support

• Assist in the development, implementation, and management of new products, services, and user experience.

• Daily operational support and management of designated third party vendors/partners.

Other duties as assigned

Qualifications

Qualifications / Requirements

• Experience in B2B client interaction and a clear understanding of national brand needs and relations preferred.

• A four (4) year accredited college degree.

• Excellent professional communication skills with a keen ability to focus on and engage people to discern the relevant details of a project are required

• Must be able to communicate effectively and professionally with all areas of the Company and all levels of management

• Exceptional email and telephone communication skills necessary

• Self-motivator with a strong sense of urgency, ability to work under pressure, and meet tight deadlines

• Established project management experience and the ability to prioritize multiple projects at one time

• Strong team skills and the ability to be self-directed and proactive

• Proficiency in Microsoft Office, with concentration on Microsoft Excel, and other database management systems

Salary range: $65,000 - $90,000 (bonus eligible)

Additional Information

NBCUniversal's policy is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, creed, gender, gender identity or expression, age, national origin or ancestry, citizenship, disability, sexual orientation, marital status, pregnancy, veteran status, membership in the uniformed services, genetic information, or any other basis protected by applicable law. NBCUniversal will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with relevant legal requirements, including the City of Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative For Hiring Ordinance, where applicable.

If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you have the right to request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access nbcunicareers.com as a result of your disability. You can request reasonable accommodations in the US by calling 1-818-777-4107 and in the UK by calling +44 2036185726.

Jobcode: Reference SBJ-d8373k-167-71-63-233-42 in your application.
